intent_atoms.description: Build an automated fuzzing harness that exercises tolerant parsing against 100+ synthetically corrupted MP4 fixtures and demonstrates a 99.9% crash‑free completion rate so lenient mode can ship with confidence.

The fuzzing harness must generate at least 100 corrupt payloads per run using deterministic mutations seeded with 42, assert a success rate of ≥99.9%, capture reproduction artifacts for any failures, and complete within a 5‑minute CI budget.
All mutation coverage tests (header truncation, overlapping ranges, bogus size) must pass with 20 iterations each.

Reproduction artifacts must be saved as JSON metadata and binary payload in Documentation/CorruptedFixtures/FuzzArtifacts/, including seed, mutation description, error message, and exact corrupt payload.
Deterministic mutations use a seeded RNG (seed 42) to ensure reproducibility of failures.
The fuzzing harness must integrate with existing tolerant parsing pipeline ParsePipeline.live(options: .tolerant), ParseIssueStore, and ChunkedFileReader.
Use a single XCTestCase class TolerantParsingFuzzTests.swift containing four test methods for core fuzz, mutation coverage, CI budget, and artifact capture.
Implement CorruptPayloadGenerator with six mutation types: header truncation, overlapping ranges, bogus size, invalid FourCC, zero‑size loop, payload truncation.
Introduce FuzzStatistics struct to track success/failure counts and generate human‑readable summary.
Use ReproductionArtifact struct and saveReproductionArtifact() helper to automatically capture artifacts for failures.

functional_units.name: TolerantParsingFuzzTests
functional_units.description: XCTestCase providing fuzzing harness for tolerant parsing against corrupted MP4 payloads

functional_units.name: testFuzzTolerantParsingWith100PlusCorruptPayloads
functional_units.description: Core test generating 100+ deterministic corrupt payloads, asserting ≥99.9% crash-free rate and capturing reproduction artifacts

functional_units.name: testHeaderTruncationMutations
functional_units.description: Mutation coverage test for header truncation scenarios (20 iterations)

functional_units.name: testOverlappingRangeMutations
functional_units.description: Mutation coverage test for overlapping parent-child range violations (20 iterations)

functional_units.name: testBogusSizeMutations
functional_units.description: Mutation coverage test for impossibly large size declarations (20 iterations)

functional_units.name: testFuzzHarnessCompletesWithinBenchmarkBudget
functional_units.description: CI integration test validating runtime within 5‑minute budget using a subset of iterations

functional_units.name: CorruptPayloadGenerator
functional_units.description: Deterministic mutation engine producing six types of MP4 corruption mutations

functional_units.name: HeaderTruncationMutation
functional_units.description: Incomplete box header mutation (1–3 bytes) applied by CorruptPayloadGenerator

functional_units.name: OverlappingRangeMutation
functional_units.description: Child boxes exceeding parent boundaries mutation

functional_units.name: BogusSizeMutation
functional_units.description: Impossibly large size declaration mutation

functional_units.name: InvalidFourCCMutation
functional_units.description: Non‑ASCII four‑character code mutation

functional_units.name: ZeroSizeLoopMutation
functional_units.description: Multiple zero‑size children to trigger loop guards

functional_units.name: PayloadTruncationMutation
functional_units.description: Declared size larger than actual payload mutation

functional_units.name: FuzzStatistics
functional_units.description: Struct aggregating success/failure counts, rates and detailed failure records

functional_units.name: ReproductionArtifact
functional_units.description: Struct holding metadata and binary payload for reproducing failures

functional_units.name: saveReproductionArtifact
functional_units.description: Helper to persist JSON metadata and MP4 payload for a failed case

functional_units.name: SeededRandomNumberGenerator
functional_units.description: LCG based RNG providing deterministic seeds for fuzzing

functional_units.name: CorruptPayload
functional_units.description: Wrapper combining binary data with mutation metadata

functional_units.name: MutationDescription
functional_units.description: Codable description of applied mutation

functional_units.name: ParseResult
functional_units.description: Aggregates completion status, event count and issue count

functional_units.name: ParsePipeline.live(".tolerant")
functional_units.description: Existing tolerant parsing pipeline used by the fuzz harness

functional_units.name: ParseIssueStore
functional_units.description: Issue aggregation store for collecting parse issues during tests

functional_units.name: ChunkedFileReader
functional_units.description: Binary reader used to read input payloads in chunks

functional_units.name: Documentation/CorruptedFixtures/FuzzArtifacts/.gitignore
functional_units.description: Git‑ignored file excluding auto‑generated artifacts from version control

functional_units.name: Documentation/CorruptedFixtures/FuzzArtifacts/README.md
functional_units.description: Guide for artifact reproduction and cleanup

functional_units.name: Summary_of_Work_T5.5
functional_units.description: Document summarizing the work done and success criteria met
